output.sentences: While at our conference we visited the Coastal Celebration.
It had a great meeting hall with a coastal view.
During break we could sit out side in the sunshine and view the ocean.
This location also had a great place to drink coffee.
After the meeting we headed home from meeting at the Coastal Celebration.
